Ad Text:
Our client, a leading company based in Brisbane, Queensland, is seeking an experienced Senior S/4HANA Finance Analyst to join their finance team. This is a fantastic opportunity to leverage your expertise in SAP S/4HANA finance modules to support and enhance financial processes within a dynamic business environment.

In this role, you will be integral to analysing, optimising, and delivering finance solutions that improve accuracy, efficiency, and reporting capabilities. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to drive system improvements, support business stakeholders, and ensure alignment with strategic financial objectives.

Key responsibilities include:

Leading the analysis and configuration of S/4HANA Finance modules to meet business requirements.
Collaborating with IT and finance teams to implement and enhance financial processes.
Providing expert advice and troubleshooting support for finance system users.
Contributing to project initiatives related to financial systems transformation.
Ensuring compliance with industry standards and internal policies involving finance systems.

The successful candidate will have extensive experience working with S/4HANA Finance, strong analytical skills, and the ability to communicate effectively with diverse stakeholder groups. If you are a proactive, solution-focused finance analyst passionate about driving system excellence, we encourage you to consider this excellent opportunity to join our clientâ€™s team.

This role is based in the vibrant and accessibleBrisbanet, offering a collaborative workplace culture and opportunities for career growth.
